channel.title: Why no announcement on the new patch?
channel.description: MM now shows as occupy immune that a big change should have announced here

item.title: Why no announcement on the new patch?
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
I agree MM is really weak right now.

I think MM should stay strong but evil king needs a nerf.

Read full topic
item.source: Why no announcement on the new patch?

item.title: Why no announcement on the new patch?
item.dc:creator: Loudo
item.description:
Man, I really don’t like these changes.

Drunk now completely impossible to fake claim, since both your night abilities leave gigantic traces whatever you do. Even if you are a Drunk converted in Assassin, you pretty much screwed if someone asks for your logs.

Mastermind is once again the only Special/Investigative in the game with occupy immunity.

Evil classes with occupy immunity in general are pretty screwed since they have no viable claim, not even for a short window of time. All you can do is claim Hunter and hope there isn’t a real one or claim Butler and throw a lot of parties in your log, hoping no one can contradict you.
And classes that can detect occupy immunity are twice more likely to appear compared to Princesses.

Read full topic
item.source: Why no announcement on the new patch?

item.title: Why no announcement on the new patch?
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
Interesting, you are right. I was sure that it had been posted on Discord.

NuclearBurrito:

Are we sure this isn’t a bug?

Yes, yes we are. It’s in the ingame patchnotes as well as on the wiki as mentioned by Ashe.

https://i.robflop.me/zfmIwGah.png

item.source: Why no announcement on the new patch?

item.title: Why no announcement on the new patch?
item.dc:creator: robflop
item.description:
It was announced ingame on the big, big field that shows you the patchnotes fyi.

Patchnotes here are usually only announced when it’s a “whole” patch such as 1.0.14 or to-come 1.0.15, the MM patch was 1.0.14d so it wasn’t announced here.

Join our Discord server if you want to always get the most up-to-date info at first, things are always announced there: https://discord.gg/tol.

Read full topic
